# The `TypeFinder` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/typefinder">TypeFinder</a> - Walk over a module, identifying all of the types that are used by the module. <a href="#details">More...</a>
